DEFECT INVESTIGATION REPORT FORMAT
Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Major
b) Defect Observed: Weapon station electrical short. Issue identified during pre-flight checks.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Software algorithm error in control logic implementation
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Weapon Release component. Physical
examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.
c) Remedial Measures Replace defective component with serviceable unit from approved stock
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Conduct fleet-wide inspection campaign
d) Attributable Code: R - Lapses on the part of Repair Agency/Manufacturer
Remarks: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Technical evaluation completed. Proposed preventive measures are appropriate and align with design intent.
Date: 25/07/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Gp Capt N.R. Kumar
